from camelot.view.controls import editors
from one2manydelegate import One2ManyDelegate


[docs]class ManyToManyDelegate(One2ManyDelegate):
    """
  .. image:: /_static/manytomany.png
  """


[docs]    def createEditor(self, parent, option, index):
        editor = editors.ManyToManyEditor(parent=parent, **self.kwargs)
        self.setEditorData(editor, index)
        editor.editingFinished.connect( self.commitAndCloseEditor )
        return editor

    #@QtCore.pyqtSlot()
    # not yet converted to new style sig slot because sender doesn't work
    # in certain versions of pyqt


[docs]    def commitAndCloseEditor(self):
        editor = self.sender()
        self.commitData.emit(editor)



[docs]    def setModelData(self, editor, model, index):
        if editor.getModel():
            model.setData(index, editor.getModel().get_collection)
